summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ALKNZ Portal MVP - backend APIs 100% functional, frontend core features working with minor UI issues

ui_bugs.issue: ALKNZ logo is static instead of floating animation as specified in requirements
Modal overlay sometimes blocks navigation clicks, requiring force=True in automation

passed_tests: Admin dashboard loads with stats (users: 2, funds: 1)
Navigation to Users, Funds, Assignments pages
User creation with auto-generated password display
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI enhancement: Add floating animation to ALKNZ logo on login page as specified in requirements. Consider improving modal dialog overlay handling to prevent interaction blocking.
